Klant: Really? Well...okay, if you think I should.

Klant got into a CR Cha=
mber.
---------------------------------------------------------------------=
---------------------
Airbomber follows Time Warp after yelling back at the=
 'Arise Optimus Prime." (See the other mail that has all of my character's =
reactions to it to see the line.)
-----------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------------------
Shokaract: It was...somet=
hing, but yet nothing. Optimus Prime seems like something, yet nothing, so =
let's just go...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
=
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, January 28, 2001 10:50 AM
  S=
ubject: MONSTER SIZED POST!(all of my characters)


  :::The Protectrons/To=
rca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
  Lynx/Orion/Airazor/Tigerhawk/Atma/Psuedo/Time =

  Warp/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hellbat/Wheeljack/Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidia=
n/Shar 

  pedge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/The 
  Destro=
cons/Falcon/Snare:: 

  ::My Maximals hear the voice.  They all wondered wh=
at it was, but they were 
  too damaged to speculate. Torca hears Klant say=
ing he doesnt need a CR:: 
  Torca: Klant, you were damaged in this battle.=
 I think it would be best if 
  you healed yourself. Remember, i have a gif=
t to give to you once everything 
  settles down. 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::As they are=
 walking, Tigerhawk and Airazor heard the voice:: 
  Airazor: Tigerhawk, wh=
at was that? 
  Tigerhawk: I have no idea. Something must be happening some=
where on this 
  planet. 
  ::They continue their walk:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Atma=
 and Psuedo hear the voice as they are searching:: 
  Psuedo: Did you hear =
something? 
  Atma: I was about to ask you the same question. 
  Psuedo: Al=
right, im officially freaked out now. 
  Atma: We'd better keep going. 
  :=
:They continue on their travels:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  Time Warp: Thats more like it=
. 
  ::Time Warp heads in a direction he feels is right, after awhile, he h=
ears 
  the voice:: 
  Time Warp: brother, did you hear what i just heard? =

  ~~~~~ 
  ::Banzai-Tron, Hurricane, and Wheeljack hear the voice:: 
  Hur=
ricane: What was that? 
  Wheeljack: it probably was- 
  Banzai-Tron: I don=
t need your opinion, inventor, i say it was nothing! You 
  arem both fools=
! 
  ::He did hear it, but he didnt want them to know:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Hellb=
at is unconsious in the CR chamber, so he doesnt hear it:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::St=
arscream, Bludgeon, and Obsidian are too wasted to hear the voice:: 
  ~~~~=
~ 
  ::Sharpedge, Jetstorm, and Godfather transform and fly out, following =
the 
  rest of the Mafia. they hear the voice:: 
  Godfather: What the f*ck=
 was that? 
  Sharpedge: I dont know. 
  Jetstorm: What do you think it is =
Shockaract? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Gigatron and the Skyscorchers hear the voice. Gig=
atron turns to Herald:: 
  Gigatron: What was that? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Destro=
ns hear it, but each of them think its their imagination, so they 
  dont b=
ring it up::
